name: chrome-sidepanel-extension
description: A Chrome MV3 extension with side panel React app
author: Your Name

scripts.fix-dev-manifest: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'build/chrome-mv3-dev-dev/manifest.json'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8')); manifest.permissions = ['sidePanel', 'activeTab', 'tabs', 'scripting', 'storage']; manifest.host_permissions = ['https://*/*', 'https://web.whatsapp.com/*', 'http://localhost:*/*']; fs.writeFileSync(path, JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2)); console.log('Dev manifest permissions fixed!'); } else { console.log('Dev manifest not found!'); }"
scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifestPath = 'src/manifest.json'; const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(manifestPath, 'utf8')); const versionParts = manifest.version.split('.'); versionParts[2] = String(parseInt(versionParts[2]) + 1); manifest.version = versionParts.join('.'); fs.writeFileSync(manifestPath, JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2)); console.log('✅ Version incremented to', manifest.version);" && plasmo build --target=chrome-mv3-prod && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const srcManifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('src/manifest.json', 'utf8')); const buildManifestPath = 'build/chrome-mv3-prod-prod/manifest.json'; const buildManifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(buildManifestPath, 'utf8')); buildManifest.version = srcManifest.version; buildManifest.permissions = ['sidePanel', 'activeTab', 'tabs', 'scripting', 'storage']; buildManifest.host_permissions = ['https://*/*', 'https://web.whatsapp.com/*', 'http://localhost:*/*']; fs.writeFileSync(buildManifestPath, JSON.stringify(buildManifest, null, 2)); console.log('✅ Build manifest version updated to', buildManifest.version);"
